arabic: طٰسۤمّۤ
transliteration_en: Taa-Seeen-Meeem
transliteration_id: Ṭā Sīm Mīm.
translation_en: Ta, Seen, Meem.
translation_id: Ṭā Sīn Mīm.

arabic: تِلْكَ اٰيٰتُ الْكِتٰبِ الْمُبِيْنِ
transliteration_en: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Mubeen
transliteration_id: Tilka āyātul-kitābil-mubīn(i).
translation_en: These are the verses of the clear Book.
translation_id: Itulah ayat-ayat Kitab (Al-Qur’an) yang jelas.

arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَاخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ اَلَّا يَكُوْنُوْا مُؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen
transliteration_id: La‘allaka bākhi‘un nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
translation_id: Boleh jadi engkau (Nabi Muhammad) akan membinasakan dirimu (dengan kesedihan) karena mereka (penduduk Makkah) tidak beriman.

arabic: اِنْ نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِمْ مِّنَ السَّمَاۤءِ اٰيَةً فَظَلَّتْ اَعْنَاقُهُمْ لَهَا خٰضِعِيْنَ
transliteration_en: In nashaa nunazzil 'alaihim minas samaaa'i Aayatan fazallat a'naaquhum lahaa khaadi'een
transliteration_id: In nasya' nunazzil ‘alaihim minas-samā'i āyatan fa ẓallat a‘nāquhum lahā khāḍi‘īn(a).
translation_en: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
translation_id: Jika berkehendak, niscaya Kami turunkan bukti (mukjizat) kepada mereka dari langit sehingga tengkuk mereka selalu tunduk kepadanya.

arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيْهِمْ مِّنْ ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ الرَّحْمٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ اِلَّا كَانُوْا عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa maa yaateehim min zikrim minar Rahmaani muhdasin illaa kaanoo 'anhu mu'rideen
transliteration_id: Wa mā ya'tīhim min żikrim minar-raḥmāni muḥdaṡin illā kānū ‘anhu mu‘riḍīn(a).
translation_en: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
translation_id: Tidak datang kepada mereka suatu peringatan baru (ayat Al-Qur’an) dari Tuhan Yang Maha Pengasih, kecuali mereka selalu berpaling darinya.

arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوْا فَسَيَأْتِيْهِمْ اَنْۢبـٰۤؤُا مَا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Faqad kazzaboo fasa yaateehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
transliteration_id: Faqad każżabū fa saya'tīhim ambā'u mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
translation_en: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
translation_id: Sungguh, mereka telah mendustakan (Al-Qur’an). Maka, kelak akan datang kepada mereka (kebenaran) berita-berita mengenai apa (azab) yang selalu mereka perolok-olokkan.

arabic: اَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا اِلَى الْاَرْضِ كَمْ اَنْۢبَتْنَا فِيْهَا مِنْ كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Awa lam yaraw ilal ardi kam ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem
transliteration_id: Awalam yarau ilal-arḍi kam ambatnā fīhā min kulli zaujin karīm(in).
translation_en: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
translation_id: Apakah mereka tidak memperhatikan bumi, betapa banyak Kami telah menumbuhkan di sana segala jenis (tanaman) yang tumbuh baik?

arabic: اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةًۗ وَمَا كَانَ اَكْثَرُهُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Inn fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
transliteration_id: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan), wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu benar-benar terdapat tanda (kekuasaan Allah), tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak beriman.

arabic: وَاِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيْزُ الرَّحِيْمُ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
transliteration_id: Inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
translation_en: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu, Dialah yang benar-benar Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Penyayang.

arabic: وَاِذْ نَادٰى رَبُّكَ مُوْسٰٓى اَنِ ائْتِ الْقَوْمَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Wa iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani'-til qawmaz zaalimeen
transliteration_id: Wa iż nādā rabbuka mūsā ani'til-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
translation_id: (Ingatlah) ketika Tuhanmu menyeru Musa (dengan firman-Nya), “Datangilah kaum yang zalim itu.

arabic: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۗ اَلَا يَتَّقُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qawma Fir'awn; alaa yattaqoon
transliteration_id: Qauma fir‘aun(a), alā yattaqūn(a).
translation_en: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
translation_id: (Yaitu) kaum Fir‘aun. Mengapa mereka tidak bertakwa?”

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ اِنِّيْٓ اَخَافُ اَنْ يُّكَذِّبُوْنِ ۗ
transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon
transliteration_id: Qāla rabbi innī akhāfu ay yukażżibūn(i).
translation_en: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
translation_id: Dia (Musa) berkata, “Wahai Tuhanku, sesungguhnya aku takut mereka akan mendustakanku.

arabic: وَيَضِيْقُ صَدْرِيْ وَلَا يَنْطَلِقُ لِسَانِيْ فَاَرْسِلْ اِلٰى هٰرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa yadeequ sadree wa laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa arsil ilaa Haaroon
transliteration_id: Wa yaḍīqu ṣadrī wa lā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa arsil ilā hārūn(a).
translation_en: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.
translation_id: Dadaku terasa sempit dan lidahku kelu. Maka, utuslah Harun (bersamaku).

arabic: وَلَهُمْ عَلَيَّ ذَنْۢبٌ فَاَخَافُ اَنْ يَّقْتُلُوْنِ  ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa lahum 'alaiya zambun fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon
transliteration_id: Wa lahum ‘alayya żambun fa akhāfu ay yaqtulūn(i).
translation_en: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
translation_id: Aku berdosa terhadap mereka. Maka, aku takut mereka akan membunuhku.”

arabic: قَالَ كَلَّا ۚفَاذْهَبَا بِاٰيٰتِنَآ اِنَّا مَعَكُمْ مُّسْتَمِعُوْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon
transliteration_id: Qāla kallā, fażhabā bi'āyātinā innā ma‘akum mustami‘ūn(a).
translation_en: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
translation_id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, “Tidak (mereka tidak akan dapat membunuhmu). Maka, pergilah berdua dengan membawa ayat-ayat Kami (mukjizat). Sesungguhnya Kami menyertaimu mendengarkan (apa yang mereka katakan).

arabic: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُوْلَآ اِنَّا رَسُوْلُ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
transliteration_id: Fa'tiyā fir‘auna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
translation_id: Maka, datanglah berdua kepada Fir‘aun dan katakanlah, ‘Sesungguhnya kami adalah utusan Tuhan semesta alam.

arabic: اَنْ اَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ ۗ
transliteration_en: An arsil ma'anaa Baneee Israaa'eel
transliteration_id: An arsil ma‘anā banī isrā'īl(a).
translation_en: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
translation_id: Lepaskanlah Bani Israil (pergi) bersama kami (menuju Baitulmaqdis).’”

arabic: قَالَ اَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِيْنَا وَلِيْدًا وَّلَبِثْتَ فِيْنَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِيْنَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw wa labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen
transliteration_id: Qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdaw wa labiṡta fīnā min ‘umurika sinīn(a).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata, “Bukankah kami telah mengasuhmu dalam lingkungan (keluarga) kami, waktu engkau masih bayi dan engkau tinggal bersama kami beberapa tahun dari umurmu.

arabic: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ الَّتِيْ فَعَلْتَ وَاَنْتَ مِنَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta wa anta minal kaafireen
transliteration_id: Wa fa‘alta fa‘latakal-latī fa‘alta wa anta minal-kāfirīn(a).
translation_en: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
translation_id: Engkau (Musa) telah melakukan (kesalahan berupa) perbuatan yang telah engkau lakukan (membunuh seseorang dari kaumku) dan engkau termasuk orang yang ingkar (terhadap kebaikan dan ketuhananku).”

arabic: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ اِذًا وَّاَنَا۠ مِنَ الضَّاۤلِّيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw wa ana minad daaaleen
transliteration_id: Qāla fa‘altuhā iżaw wa ana minaḍ-ḍāllīn(a).
translation_en: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
translation_id: Dia (Musa) berkata, “Aku telah melakukannya. Kalau begitu, saat itu aku termasuk orang-orang yang sesat.

arabic: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنْكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِيْ رَبِّيْ حُكْمًا وَّجَعَلَنِيْ مِنَ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fafarartu minkum lam maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw wa ja'alanee minal mursaleen
transliteration_id: Fa farartu minkum lammā khiftukum fa wahaba lī rabbī ḥukmaw wa ja‘alanī minal-mursalīn(a).
translation_en: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
translation_id: Kemudian, aku lari darimu karena takut kepadamu. Lalu, Tuhanku menganugerahkan kepadaku hukum (ilmu dan kearifan) dan menjadikanku salah seorang rasul.

arabic: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ اَنْ عَبَّدْتَّ بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Wa tilka ni'matun tamun nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel
transliteration_id: Wa tilka ni‘matun tamunnuhā ‘alayya an ‘abbatta banī isrā'īl(a).
translation_en: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
translation_id: Itulah kenikmatan yang engkau berikan kepadaku, (sedangkan) engkau memperbudak Bani Israil.”

arabic: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Qaala Fir'awnu wa maa Rabbul 'aalameen
transliteration_id: Qāla fir‘aunu wa mā rabbul-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"
translation_id: Fir‘aun berkata, “Siapa Tuhan semesta alam itu?”

arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَاۗ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّوْقِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa in kuntum mooqineen
transliteration_id: Qāla rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā, in kuntum mūqinīn(a).
translation_en: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
translation_id: Dia (Musa) menjawab, “Tuhan (pencipta dan pemelihara) langit, bumi, dan segala yang ada di antaranya jika kamu orang-orang yang yakin.”

arabic: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهٗٓ اَلَا تَسْتَمِعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala liman hawlahooo alaa tastami'oon
transliteration_id: Qāla liman ḥaulahū alā tastami‘ūn(a).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata kepada orang-orang di sekitarnya, “Tidakkah kamu mendengar (apa yang dikatakannya)?”

arabic: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ اٰبَاۤىِٕكُمُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
transliteration_id: Qāla rabbukum wa rabbu ābā'ikumul-awwalīn(a).
translation_en: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
translation_id: Dia (Musa) berkata, “(Dia) Tuhanmu dan Tuhan nenek moyangmu terdahulu.”

arabic: قَالَ اِنَّ رَسُوْلَكُمُ الَّذِيْٓ اُرْسِلَ اِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُوْنٌ
transliteration_en: Qaala inna Rasoolakumul lazee ursila ilaikum lamajnoon
transliteration_id: Qāla inna rasūlakumul-lażī ursila ilaikum lamajnūn(un).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata, “Sesungguhnya rasulmu yang diutus kepadamu benar-benar gila.”

arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَاۗ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْقِلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi wa maa baina humaa in kuntum ta'qiloon
transliteration_id: Qāla rabbul-masyriqi wal-magribi wa mā bainahumā, in kuntum ta‘qilūn(a).
translation_en: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
translation_id: Dia (Musa) berkata, “(Dia) Tuhan (yang menguasai) timur dan barat serta segala yang ada di antaranya jika kamu mengerti.”

arabic: قَالَ لَىِٕنِ اتَّخَذْتَ اِلٰهًا غَيْرِيْ لَاَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ الْمَسْجُوْنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala la'init takhazta ilaahan ghairee la aj'alannaka minal masjooneen
transliteration_id: Qāla la'inittakhażta ilāhan gairī la'aj‘alannaka minal-masjūnīn(a).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata, “Sungguh, jika engkau menyembah Tuhan selainku, niscaya aku benar-benar akan menjadikanmu termasuk orang-orang yang dipenjarakan.”

arabic: قَالَ اَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَيْءٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
transliteration_en: Qaala awalw ji'tuka bishai'im mubeen
transliteration_id: Qāla awalau ji'tuka bisyai'im mubīn(in).
translation_en: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
translation_id: Dia (Musa) berkata, “Apakah (engkau akan melakukan itu) sekalipun aku mendatangkan kepadamu sesuatu (bukti) yang jelas?”

arabic: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهٖٓ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen
transliteration_id: Qāla fa'ti bihī in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata, “Datangkanlah (bukti yang jelas) itu jika engkau termasuk orang-orang yang benar!”

arabic: فَاَلْقٰى عَصَاهُ فَاِذَا هِيَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِيْنٌ ۚ
transliteration_en: Fa alqaa 'asaahu fa izaaa hiya su'baanum mubeen
transliteration_id: Fa alqā ‘aṣāhu fa iżā hiya ṡu‘bānum mubīn(un).
translation_en: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.
translation_id: Maka, dia (Musa) melemparkan tongkatnya, tiba-tiba ia (tongkat itu) menjadi ular besar yang nyata.

arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهٗ فَاِذَا هِيَ بَيْضَاۤءُ لِلنّٰظِرِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa naza'a yadahoo faizaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaa zireen
transliteration_id: Wa naza‘a yadahū fa iżā hiya baiḍā'u lin-nāẓirīn(a).
translation_en: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.
translation_id: Dia menarik tangannya, tiba-tiba ia (tangan itu) menjadi putih (bercahaya) bagi orang-orang yang melihat(-nya).

arabic: قَالَ لِلْمَلَاِ حَوْلَهٗٓ اِنَّ هٰذَا لَسٰحِرٌ عَلِيْمٌ ۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala lilmala-i hawlahooo inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem
transliteration_id: Qāla lil-mala'i ḥaulahū inna hāżā lasāḥirun ‘alīm(un).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata kepada para pemuka di sekitarnya, “Sesungguhnya dia (Musa) ini benar-benar seorang penyihir yang sangat pandai.

arabic: يُّرِيْدُ اَنْ يُّخْرِجَكُمْ مِّنْ اَرْضِكُمْ بِسِحْرِهٖۖ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Yureedu ai yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihee famaazaa taamuroon
transliteration_id: Yurīdu ay yukhrijakum min arḍikum bisiḥrih(ī), fa māżā ta'murūn(a).
translation_en: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"
translation_id: Dia hendak mengeluarkanmu dari negerimu dengan sihirnya. Maka, apa yang kamu sarankan?”

arabic: قَالُوْٓا اَرْجِهْ وَاَخَاهُ وَابْعَثْ فِى الْمَدَاۤىِٕنِ حٰشِرِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Qaalooo arjih wa akhaahu wab'as filmadaaa'ini haashireen
transliteration_id: Qālū arjih wa akhāhu wab‘aṡ fil-madā'ini ḥāsyirīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Tahanlah (untuk sementara) dia dan saudaranya serta utuslah ke seluruh negeri orang-orang yang akan mengumpulkan (penyihir).

arabic: يَأْتُوْكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Yaatooka bikulli sah haarin 'aleem
transliteration_id: Ya'tūka bikulli saḥḥārin ‘alīm(in).
translation_en: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
translation_id: Mereka akan mendatangkan kepadamu semua penyihir yang sangat pandai.”

arabic: فَجُمِعَ السَّحَرَةُ لِمِيْقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُوْمٍ ۙ
transliteration_en: Fa jumi'as saharatu limeeqaati Yawmim ma'loom
transliteration_id: Fa jumi‘as-saḥaratu limīqāti yaumim ma‘lūm(in).
translation_en: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.
translation_id: Maka, dikumpulkanlah para penyihir pada waktu (yang ditetapkan) pada hari yang telah ditentukan.

arabic: وَّقِيْلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ اَنْتُمْ مُّجْتَمِعُوْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Wa qeela linnaasi hal antum mujtami'oon
transliteration_id: Wa qīla lin-nāsi hal antum mujtami‘ūn(a).
translation_en: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
translation_id: Lalu, diumumkan kepada orang banyak, “Apakah kamu semua sudah berkumpul?

arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ السَّحَرَةَ اِنْ كَانُوْا هُمُ الْغٰلِبِيْنَ
transliteration_en: La'allanaa nattabi'us saharata in kaanoo humul ghaalibeen
transliteration_id: La‘allanā nattabi‘us-saḥarata in kānū humul-gālibīn(a).
translation_en: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
translation_id: (Tujuannya) supaya kita mengikuti para penyihir itu jika mereka jadi para pemenang.”

arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاۤءَ السَّحَرَةُ قَالُوْا لِفِرْعَوْنَ اَىِٕنَّ لَنَا لَاَجْرًا اِنْ كُنَّا نَحْنُ الْغٰلِبِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Falammaa jaaa'as saharatu qaaloo li Fir'awna a'inna lanaa la ajjran in kunnaa nahnul ghaalibeen
transliteration_id: Falammā jā'as-saḥaratu qālū lifir‘auna a'inna lanā la'ajran in kunnā naḥnul-gālibīn(a).
translation_en: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
translation_id: Maka, ketika para penyihir datang, mereka berkata kepada Fir‘aun, “Apakah kami benar-benar akan memperoleh imbalan besar jika kami yang menjadi pemenang?”

arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَاِنَّكُمْ اِذًا لَّمِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala na'am wa innakum izal laminal muqarrabeen
transliteration_id: Qāla na‘am wa innakum iżal laminal-muqarrabīn(a).
translation_en: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) menjawab, “Ya, bahkan kamu pasti akan menjadi orang-orang yang dekat (kepadaku).”

arabic: قَالَ لَهُمْ مُّوْسٰٓى اَلْقُوْا مَآ اَنْتُمْ مُّلْقُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon
transliteration_id: Qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mulqūn(a).
translation_en: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
translation_id: Musa berkata kepada mereka, “Lemparkanlah apa yang hendak kamu lemparkan!”

arabic: فَاَلْقَوْا حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوْا بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ اِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْغٰلِبُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa alqaw hibaalahum wa 'isiyyahum wa qaaloo bi'izzati Fir'awna innaa lanahnul ghaaliboon
transliteration_id: Fa alqau ḥibālahum wa ‘iṣiyyahum wa qālū bi‘izzati fir‘auna innā lanaḥnul-gālibūn(a).
translation_en: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
translation_id: Lalu, mereka melemparkan tali-tali dan tongkat-tongkat mereka seraya berkata, “Demi kekuasaan Fir‘aun, sesungguhnya kamilah yang benar-benar sebagai pemenang.”

arabic: فَاَلْقٰى مُوْسٰى عَصَاهُ فَاِذَا هِيَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Fa alqaa Moosaa 'asaahu fa izaa hiya talqafu maa yaafikoon
transliteration_id: Fa alqā mūsā ‘aṣāhu fa iżā hiya talqafu mā ya'fikūn(a).
translation_en: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.
translation_id: Kemudian, Musa melemparkan tongkatnya, tiba-tiba ia (tongkatnya yang sudah menjadi ular) menelan segala yang mereka ada-adakan itu.

arabic: فَاُلْقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ سٰجِدِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Fa ulqiyas saharatu saajideen
transliteration_id: Fa ulqiyas-saḥaratu sājidīn(a).
translation_en: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
translation_id: Maka, tersungkurlah para penyihir itu (dalam keadaan) bersujud.

arabic: قَالُوْٓا اٰمَنَّا بِرَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbil 'aalameen
transliteration_id: Qālū āmannā birabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Kami beriman kepada Tuhan semesta alam,

arabic: رَبِّ مُوْسٰى وَهٰرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Rabbi Moosaa wa Haaroon
transliteration_id: Rabbi mūsā wa hārūn(a).
translation_en: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
translation_id: (yaitu) Tuhannya Musa dan Harun.”

arabic: قَالَ اٰمَنْتُمْ لَهٗ قَبْلَ اَنْ اٰذَنَ لَكُمْۚ اِنَّهٗ لَكَبِيْرُكُمُ الَّذِيْ عَلَّمَكُمُ السِّحْرَۚ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ ەۗ لَاُقَطِّعَنَّ اَيْدِيَكُمْ وَاَرْجُلَكُمْ مِّنْ خِلَافٍ وَّلَاُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'alla makumus sihra falasawfa ta'lamoon; la uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilaafinw wa la usallibanna kum ajma'een
transliteration_id: Qāla āmantum lahū qabla an āżana lakum, innahū lakabīrukumul-lażī ‘allamakumus-siḥr(a), fa lasaufa ta‘lamūn(a), la'uqaṭṭi‘anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilāfiw wa la'uṣallibannakum  ajma'īn(a).
translation_en: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."
translation_id: Dia (Fir‘aun) berkata, “Apakah kamu sekalian beriman kepadanya (Musa) sebelum aku mengizinkanmu? Sesungguhnya dia benar-benar pemimpinmu yang mengajarkan sihir kepadamu. Maka, kamu tentu akan tahu (akibat perbuatanmu). Pasti kupotong tangan dan kakimu secara bersilang dan benar-benar akan kusalib kamu semua.”

arabic: قَالُوْا لَا ضَيْرَ ۖاِنَّآ اِلٰى رَبِّنَا مُنْقَلِبُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo la daira innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa munqalliboon
transliteration_id: Qālū lā ḍair(a), innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūn(a).
translation_en: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Tidak ada yang kami takutkan. Sesungguhnya kami akan kembali kepada Tuhan kami.
